name: Where the Sea Meets the Sky
summary: Where the Sea Meets the Sky is a narrative-driven puzzle game about death and grief. Players take on the role of Susu as she uncovers a hidden secret held by Grandma after the passing of Grandpa. Susu will help Grandma work through her grief and come to a different understanding of death, drawing from her perspective and memories as a little child.
